boost::logging::filter::ts

boost::logging::filter::ts Struct Reference

Thread-safe filter. Manages is_enabled/set_enabled in a thread-safe way. More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Thread-safe filter. Manages is_enabled/set_enabled in a thread-safe way.

However, it manages it rather ineffiently - always locking before asking.
